description: CSS file containing variables and styles for light and dark themes, as well as responsive styles for the App component.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for layout and theming.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including a spinning animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with layout styles.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for hyperlinks within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling the theme with hover and active states.
